item.title: Monty Hall Simulation
item.description: Created a simulation of the Monty Hall problem for an article I wrote on Medium. Most of the work honestly went into making the graph look nice. I wanted it to match the colour scheme of the other diagrams in the article.

item.title: CNN for digit recognition
item.techniques: Python: pytorch, manim. Convolutional neural networks.
item.description: I wanted to create a nice animated diagram of a CNN (convolutional neural network) for an article I wrote on Medium. The article was generally about artificial intelligence, and I thought it would be helpful to have a nice illustrative gif of a classic AI problem - recognising digits. I created this animation using Pytorch and Manim.
